text: Hey CMCG fam. Sorry for the late notice...I'm doing an email copywriting 101 webinar with my friends at ConvertKit today at 2pm EST. If you or someone you know wants to learn some good email marketing tips, grab a spot! <https://convertkit.com/workshop/chris12>

attachments.title: Email Writing 101: The top 5 tips for engaging your list in a COVID world
attachments.text: Do you worry about annoying your email readers with your content? Tired of all the email marketing and content creation overwhelm? Join Angel Marie (ConvertKit) and Chris Craft (InspireFirst) in this free online workshop to get five writing prompts to help you create undeniably readable emails while remaining productive along your creator journey.
attachments.fallback: ConvertKit: Email Writing 101: The top 5 tips for engaging your list in a COVID world
